tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Amazing professor. In class time is spent hearing him read stories, but also gives great writing advice. By far my favorite English teacher out of all the years of middle/high school/college.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: SUPER friendly guy. I forgot the first assignment and he let me email it to him the next day for full credit. Really laid back, my only issue is that the entire class he spends reading papers or Stephen King passages. That is in no way a deal breaker though, I wish all my professors were like him!

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Awesome Professor, he\'s really laid back and i actually had fun writing his papers because of the topics he picked. Definitely recommend

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Advanced Expository Writing class was one of the easiest best classes I\'ve ever taken! He is amazing and very helpful. It is one of the best classes you will ever take! Great personality, humorous, attendance not recorded.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Easiest college course I have taken. He is funny, down to earth, and a very easy grader. There is 1 assignment each week, but nothing that is too crazy. Most assignments are no longer than 200 words! If you\'re looking for an easy A then this is the class to take!

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Boring teacher. I learned nothing like how to correct my errors on my papers. All he talked about was Stephen King. Easy work but useless.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: best teacher highly recomended.. down to earth n very understanding alsogreat grader..

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Clavin is an easy teacher, no major assignments, no tests or finals...But he spends all class reading out of an promoting his book. The time that isn\'t spent like that is spent either reading from Stephan King or clearing his throat obnoxiously. Not bad if you want an easy grade, but annoying if you actually expected to be taught.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Easy teacher, easy class, very nice and funny guy. only assignment is one paper per week. no tests, quizzes, textbook or final. I highly recommend him.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: great teacher! hes funny and a good person, he only makes you do 1 paper a week so he is very easy, and he is very easy on grading

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Pretty cool teacher. He\'s a little funny. He has you right a page a week on the theme he gives you the week before. He grades easy and he\'s really sweet.
